Summary: Tons of lights in the sky was mimicking my 11yr old daughter play w laser light
divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened to my child.. I (mama) did not witness, but our neighbor did. This is haunting her big time. Tons of lights in the sky was mimicking my 11yr old daughter play w laser light. They heard a humming sound. She said everything she did (pattern wise) they copied her. I dont know how to explain this. And this is not the first or even second time this happened. Its happend (different circumstances) many times. All times she was present
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gibson
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
